text: Farewell, America () is a 1951 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Dovzhenko.Шпион, пришедший с холодной войныПрощай, Америка! (1951) The movie is based on the book by the American journalist Annabelle Bucar "The Truth about American Diplomats". It stars Liliya Gritsenko, Nikolai Gritsenko, and Grigori Kirillov. == Actors == * Liliya Gritsenko * Nikolai Gritsenko * Grigori Kirillov as Walter Scott, American Ambassador in Moscow * Janis Osis * Lyudmila Shagalova * Grigoriy Shpigel == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1951 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Dovzhenko
title: Farewell, America
